name: Grey Space
description:
Grey Space is a strange and unnecessarily disturbing puzzle game. Train a parrot to say new words in Story mode. Race against the clock in Arcade Mode. And try to get your highest score in Zen Mode.

This game was made for the 2 Colours game jam.

I hope you enjoy 🙂

***Note to 2 Colours Jammers***

The Camera in this game runs through a threshold filter, contrast filter, additive grain, then finally a latched pixelator which can only output black or white pixels. The final image is not anti-aliased and so should be pure black and white pixels only.

Unfortunately the dialogue bar in story mode would just disappear if I used any screen space filtering on it so it is anti-aliased and not latched to black and white. I understand that this is against the game jam rules and you may judge my game accordingly.

*** Windows build uploaded the 23/7/18 identical to OSX build ***

Cheers,

- Mow
